Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Statuette of a Fish
Description: The small statue depicts a fish with a big head and a round, open mouth with prominent edges. The eyes are round and outlined. The body is covered with beautifully shaped scales. A large fin is under the front part of the abdomen and a back fin is on the upper part in the form of inclined lines. The tail is now broken
